item.title: About
item.description: This is Yong Han’s page. I am now working as a data analyst of a small company of Shenzhen. I graduated in International Economies and Trade from Huanggang Normal University. After got out of school, I find there is no place for me. The daily work was so bored and I live in the past. One day I realized I like statistics a little. I started to read books about statistics in English since then.
